seo.title: About SustainSage
seo.description: Meet the bilingual coaches behind SustainSage — an ICF-aligned practice for people navigating cross-cultural transitions.

hero.title: A small, ICF-aligned practice for people living between worlds.
hero.subtitle: We coach in English, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese so you can think in the language that feels steady.
hero.note: Coaching is not therapy, counselling, legal, financial, or immigration advice.
hero.imageAlt: Two coaches collaborating in a calm workspace

cards.title: Ethos
points: Consent-led conversations — you decide depth and pace.
We name scope limits early and re-contract when needed.

cards.title: Who we serve
points: People relocating, returning to work, or leading across cultures.
Diaspora professionals balancing family, visas, and wellbeing.
Teams or founders seeking reflective space beyond hype.

cards.title: How we work
points: Hybrid of narrative coaching, systems thinking, and facilitation.
Sessions are 50 minutes with light check-ins between as agreed.
We co-design experiments that respect your constraints.

coaches.title: Meet your coaches
coaches.subtitle: Two bilingual practitioners who have navigated cross-border careers themselves.

cards.name: Hao-Cheng Tsai
points: Background in civic innovation and public sector design.
Coaching style: reflective, systems-aware, gentle accountability.
Focus areas: mid-career transitions, public service teams, values-led organisations.

cards.name: Yi-Ling Lai
points: Background across community learning and intercultural programmes.
Focus areas: caregivers returning to work, cross-cultural leaders, purpose-led founders.

principles.title: Our principles
items: We follow the ICF Code of Ethics and ongoing supervision.
Confidentiality is upheld within legal and safeguarding limits.
Coaching is different from therapy, legal, immigration, or financial advice.
We co-design goals, agreements, and ways of working at every stage.

experience.title: What it feels like to work with us
items: Calm, structured conversations that centre your lived realities.
Space to shift languages or metaphors without needing to translate yourself.
Honest reflections, gentle challenge, and no pressure to rush decisions.

icfSummary.title: Ethics & data care
icfSummary.body: We align with the ICF Code of Ethics and UK data protection law. Notes are minimal, stored securely, and only shared when safeguarding or legal duties require it — always discussed with you first.

cta.title: Ready to explore whether we fit?
cta.body: Share the transition you’re navigating. We will offer a coaching pathway or suggest alternatives so you can decide with confidence.
cta.primaryAria: Book an intro session with SustainSage
